section.heading: Statute of limitations for warranties.
section.text: A judicial proceeding for breach of any warranty that arises under § 42-1903.16 shall be commenced within 5 years after the date the warranty period began.

annoGroup.heading: History
annoGroup.annotation: as added Mar. 8, 1991, D.C. Law 8-233, § 2(kk), 38 DCR 261
